column4: [Bump] I just bought a new PC. I like to install (as before) Ubuntu now. Should I install 12.04 beta2 or 11.10 and in 2 weeks 12.04 final???
I'd install 11.10 and wait for the final. Too many issues are sorted out in the early days that the new version comes out
I'm quit technical, so issues can be fixed. It's more like: is it stable enough for daily use?
